metadata.title: USN-4314-1 -- pam-krb5 vulnerability
metadata.description: Russ Allbery discovered that pam-krb5 incorrectly handled some responses. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4314-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libpam-heimdal - 4.7-2ubuntu0.1 libpam-krb5 - 4.7-2ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
